active_incidents.title: Some users may experience loading issues in Slack

notes.body: Users may still be unable to load threads, mentions & reactions. We're continuing to investigate these along with the email delivery issues some users are experiencing.  We greatly appreciate your patience, and will let you know as soon as we have another update to share.

Some users may be experiencing issues loading threads, mentions & reactions and trouble with email delivery. Weâ€™re currently investigating the issue and will provide a status update once we have more information.
